Class ResponseMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • ResponseMatrix

  • public class ResponseMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    The representation of the memory graph as an adjacency matrix
    Author:
    Alex

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResponseMatrix

        public ResponseMatrix(int size)
        The data structure for the stored conversation: a directed graph. Implements functionality to keep the graph up to date and to query it for Responses for the bot to return.
        Parameters:
        size -

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints the matrix, including x and y coordinates and a the responses they correspond to on the right. Useful if you'd like to check the graph, for debugging or other reasons.
